data.title: Check out how great these Atari 7800 games are these days
data.text:
The Atari 7800 still has new games releases after being released 23 years ago outside of being test marketed in 1984 and the games are excellent .

Impressive arcade port of Super Pac-man

All these games are found at the Atariage Store. The link for the Atari 7800 section is

http://atariage.com/store ./index.php?l=product_list&c=23 .

StarBoy91 wrote:

Man, why couldn't the NES have had a Jr. Pac-Man port, or even Pac & Pal? Still, nice! How's Super Pac Man, reminds me of Pac & Pal (which was fun)?

Pac & Pal ran on Namco Super Pac-Man hardware and I think it is one of the reasons why Super Pac-man reminds you of Pac & Pal.

The Nes didn't get a Jr. Pac-man port because of the unauthorized status of this game. Bally Midway created the game without the authorization of Namco. I don't about why for Pac & PAl besides being the rarest pac-man arcade game.

Turbo+Genesis+64 wrote:

Imagine how incredible Road Blasters, Pacmania, and Vindicators would be for the 7800, if they were done right.

It is ironic you said Pacmania. When the author of Jr. Pac-man was working on the game, people on Atariage had a list of pac-man games that wanted the author to do next including Pacmania. The other pac-man games mentioned at the time by other Atariage members were Pac-land, Baby Pac-man, and Pac & Pal.

The author of Jr. Pac-man is responsible for all the Atari 7800 Pac-man games found at the Atariage store and that is were people on Atariage wanted the author to do another Pac-man game.

The author of Jr. Pac-man is currently taking a break from doing homebrew games due to something outside of the internet. All I know is that the person's next game is not a pac-man game. The game is called Failsafe. Failsafe actually is the Atari 5200 game Countermeasure. I am not familiar with the game since I never played or own an Atari 5200 game console.

The author does do games that aren't that part of the Pac-man series of games time to time for the Atari 7800
